coreAttributes.name: Ultra-Steel Blade
coreAttributes.description: A sword of mysterious origin, with a straight, single-edged ultra-strong blade made of a brittle high carbon steel. Despite being longer than average swords, it is extremely light. It has a dual trigger guard. It is traditionally used as a pair.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] Ultra-Steel Blade at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] ultra-steel blade at [npc2.name], grinning as the ultra-strong blade leaves a huge gash on [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] ultra-steel blade, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ultra-strong blade scrape on [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] ultra-steel blade, causing [npc2.her] to stagger back as the ultra-strong blade leaves a deep gash on [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] ultra-steel blade at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] ultra-steel blade, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] ultra-steel blade, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
